tracks.text: Segawa lies face down in her apartment. A cartoon bear lies face down in a blizzard.
Segawa rolls over.
Aoi picks up her own phone
Shizuka Sakaki, Rookie Voice Actor, stands in the rain near an office building.
She holds an audition script.
A hand sketches Aoi. The paper is flipped up. A red pencil adds notes. Lines marked with heights appear behind her. The Musashino workers appear, standing across the width of the page, with names.
Aoi gains color, then runs off the page, onto the street in front of Musashino. Ema, Misa, Midori, and Kuza follow behind her.

Aoi dials a corded phone. Taro photocopies and papers go flying. Erika types on a phone. Ochiai, Honda, and Watanabe stare at phones. Manager Yuka stands in a business suit. Ogasawara poses in a black gothic lolita dress. Uchida wears a hoodie and glasses. Segawa has a long brown brain and yellow shirt.
A clip of Exodus is displayed on a car's window shield. It depicts a pink haired girl running in a circle.
The pink haired girl is replaced with a girl with short brown hair and a red bow runs. She's replaced by a girl with long black hair and a blue dress.
As Aoi drives, a blue car approaches. She looks at him, and Tomagaya looks back.
They race down the road.
Aoi adjusts the a gear and her car spins 180 degrees while drifting across a median.
Aoi smiles and Tomagaya as they drive in opposite directions.
Aoi's car flies over a hill at sunrise.
Aoi smiles and holds beer
Erika drinks an energy drink.
Ema smiles and waves.
Marukawa grills while other Musashino staff gather around.
Aoi eats a donut. Midori draws in the air. Ema wakes from her desk.
Zuka reads lines in a recording booth.
Misa stands in front of a green screen wearing glowing orbs across her waist, chest, arms, and head. She swings a bat. A Motion Capture figure mimics her movements.
Aoi and Ema's pink fingers interlace.
Misa, Ema, Aoi, Zuka, and Midori stand with interlocking pinkies on a roof watching the sun over the horizon.
Stills from the show appear on pieces of film
Text appears, Shirobako.
At the Musashino offices at night
Aoi stares at him
Title card
Endo looks at a drawing of a character through a transparent yellow paper. He draws a line over the chin of the character, then lifts the yellow paper and reviews the unobstructed drawing.
Key Animation Uchida reviews the drawings.
Colorer Shinkawa colors the drawing on a computer. Aoi leans over.

Director of Photography Sakura draws lines over the colored drawing. He clicks a button, and the outlined area gains a lens flair. Then, a mall background appears behind the character. He opens a color picker dialog as Aoi approaches.
Aoi bows. Sakura picks up a piece of paper and hands it to her.

Ema, a Key Animator, stands outside with a phone to her ear. She watches as Aoi walks through a door, down the stairs, and around the sidewalk. Ema leans over the railing and waves, but Aoi doesn't notice.
Zuka cleans in a restaurant. She has long red hair in a ponytail.
Ema watches Key Animator Sugie walk away. At the recording studio, Director Kinoshita holds a pencil over a blank spot of paper.
Kinoshita taps his pencil. He frowns and rests his chin in his hand. 3 girls approach.
The booth with actors
Sketches of a theme park appear. The 3 actresses stand at microphones.
Sound Director looks at the script
Mixer Yamabuchi pushes 3 faders forward. A red light turns on.
Ramen shop
Taro thumbs up
In the Studio, Aoi watches Exodus
On the anime, a purple haired woman's hair blows in the wind.
Akane and Aya turn to Aurpin.
Episode Director Yamada side-eyes Kinoshita
Line Producer Nabe-P looks up from his phone.
At the Musashino offices at night, staff gather in a tight conference room
Marukawa hands Aoi snacks
He raises his hands in the hair.
He gestures to the table. Everyone turns.
Aoi gestures to the table. It glows with a purple light. Aya, Akane, and Aurpin float in a circle, eyes closed.
The staff stare up, eyes wide. The light shines through the conference room windows in the dark office.
Kinoshita smiles and bawls.
Arupin floats to Kinoshita and takes his hands, smiling.
Aya floats to Yamada.
Akane twirls in the center of the table.
The light glows in the window of the building, in the empty night.
Conference room
Taro throws the plate with 100 meatball sized takoyaki. Ogasawara elegantly catches the plate and balls..
Aoi passes Marukawa and runs down the hall to her desk.
She picks up an envelope
and runs back to the conference room.
Yellow rectangular lights fall across a night sky above a stylized city. The lights are glowing peg boards.
Sketches of pirate goth doll and teddy bear standing in a field of grass.
A sketch depicts them from below, underneath a cloudy sky. Another depicts from the side, with mountains in the background.
Another depicts them sitting on either side of a drawing desk.
The sketches gain color.
The doll and bear slowly stand
They raise then lower their right hands.
They raise and lower both hands.
They turn to the side and raise their hands as is dancing
They face each other and bow.
They face us and jump, raising their hands and feet wide
They lean to the left then right, punching the air.
They put their hands on their hips and skip across the table.
The doll shakes her head and wags a finger.
The bear holds his face and blushes.
The bear taps his foot and claps. The doll sways back and forth and blows a kiss.
He leans to the side and holds a hand to his ear. She arcs her hand out from one side to the other.
He turns away and shakes his butt. He turns to the side and mimes skating.
She lifts her hands over head then lowers them to her sides.
She clasps her hands together,
He holds a pink envelope with a red heart.
He holds out the envelope. She turns away and puts her hands on her hips. He faceplants forward.
